data.title: President's Circle
data.meta_description: MVNU's President’s Circle is a group or friends and alumni supporters who contribute $1,000 or more to the university in a fiscal year.
data.text:
Give

PRESIDENT'S CIRCLE

Mount Vernon Nazarene University’s President’s Circle is made up of friends and alumni supporters who contribute $1,000 or more to the university during our current or prior fiscal year (July 1 – June 30). Their gift fuels the University Vision to change the world with the love of Christ.

As our partner in the President’s Circle, you help provide the tools needed today to shape the influencers of tomorrow. Your contribution makes a transformative difference in families, communities and beyond.

Your investment impacts the entire MVNU Experience by:

Providing tuition assistance to those in need

Enhancing the quality of classroom and lab experiences

Increasing the availability of service learning trips

Supporting extra-curricular involvement… and so much more!

We will show our appreciation by:

Inviting you to special events with the MVNU President and other society members.

Communicating university updates through the Mount Vernon NOW magazine and The Flame donor newsletter.

Recognizing you in the President’s Annual Report and our website (if desired).

Frequently Asked Questions

Can I give something other than cash, or invest in something more long-term? Yes and each presents different tax benefits, some options are listed below.

Gift in Kind - A donation of goods or services.

Gift of Insurance –You can invest portion of your insurance investment

Funding an Endowment – You can invest in an endowed scholarship that will continue forever

Giving in Honor or Memory of someone – Yes, you can name the investment to honor a living person or give as a memorial

Gifts of Stock or Real Estate – Yes, let us know what you would like to give and when we can expect to receive it

Donor Advised Fund – You may specify when distributions are made from your Donor Advised Funds

Gift from an Employer Match – Yes, if you give a portion and your employer matches the rest you will still qualify for membership

Can I pay over a certain time period and still receive the benefits?

Yes! Just let us know what works for you and we will count your gift as a pledge to be paid in full by the end of the fiscal year.

President's Circle Members

Honors those individuals who have given gifts of $1,000 or more during our current or prior fiscal year (July 1 – June 30). Names to be added monthly.
